testcase.classname: Feature to test Jiva design View Fabric Sheet Working Functionality
testcase.name: To Test the user able to navigate to Fabric T and A Data entry screen
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to Login page...........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on the Woven Module...............................................passed Then Click on Fabric sourcing module........................................passed And click on Reports in fabric sourcing module..............................passed And click on View fabric sheet working......................................passed Then Click on Style show/hide button........................................passed Then Click on Filter button in the Menu list................................passed And Verifying the Buyer field for selecting a Buyer.........................passed And Verify whether the user is able to select a Season in the season field..passed And Click on the Status field...............................................passed When User select the Status.................................................passed And Enter the IPO or Buyer in the Search by Buyer Style or IPO field........passed Then Click on Apply button..................................................passed
